DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether use losartan amlodipine together non-inferior lower blood pressure amlodipine alone .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Losartan + Amlodipine Compared Amlodipine Alone Treatment Uncontrolled High Blood Pressure ( MK-0954F-399 )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Participants essential hypertension : single drug therapy newly diagnose yet take drug therapy , drug therapy least 2 week prior enter study blood pressure read 90mmHg ≤ MSDBP < 110mmHg 140mmHg ≤ MSSBP < 180mmHg 2 week washout patient single agent . Randomization ( Visit 3 ) After dose amlodipine 5mg 6 week , blood pressure reading : 90mmHg ≤ MSDBP < 110mmHg 140mmHg ≤ MSSBP < 180mmHg . Exclusion criterion Participant MSDBP ≥ 110mmHg MSSBP ≥ 180mmHg . Participant currently take ≥ 2 antihypertensive medication ( note : fixeddose combination medicine count number active ingredient ) . Participant known secondary hypertension etiology . Participant malignant hypertension current evidence impend active malignant hypertension , include headache , papilledema , cardiac ischemia , pulmonary congestion precipitate elevated blood pressure . Participant known intolerance , contraindication hypersensitivity component dihydropyridines , angiotensin II receptor blocker .
